description: emergency care department or acute or emergency dental service
general practitioner: after a request for immediate admission has been made direct to a hospital provider i.e. not through a bed bureau by a gp or deputy
consultant clinic of this or another health care provider
admission via mental health crisis resolution team (available from 2013/14)
emergency care department of another provider where the patient had not been admitted (available from 2013/14)
transfer of an admitted patient from another hospital provider in an emergency (available from 2013/14)
